data.name: Burning Faith - Power of Capitalism
data.detailed_description:
★ POWER OF CAPITALISM ★
Get 2000G and some rings from the start (including unique ones!),
plus double amount of gold for each battle completed!

Get rich or die trying!


This DLC lets you DOUBLE the amount of gold you receive at the end of each battle.
You also start the game with 2000 extra gold and 1 copy of each of the desert rings,
or 2 unique items allowing you to walk on water and fly.

  • Choice #1: King's Garment + Angel Ring + Horizon Ring
  • Choice #2: King's Garment + Assault Ring + Rebel Ring + Meditation Ring + Chance Ring + Life Ring + Oracle Ring
